title: Ilia Malinin, Who Led the U.S. to Gold, Is Bringing Ice Skating Back Into the Limelight
desc: Ilia Malinin, who led the United States to a team gold medal at the Winter Olympics and will now vie for his own, is testing the physical limits of what is possible on the ice.

title: Iran deepens crackdown following mass protests
desc: Iran arrested a prominent reformist, local media reported on Monday, deepening a crackdown on dissent following mass protests that posed one of the greatest challenges to the Islamic republic since its inception. The arrest of Javad Emam, the spokesperson for the main reformist coalition, came days after Iranian and US officials held talks in Oman [â€¦]

title: Australia PM 'devastated' as police and protesters clash over Israeli leader's visit
desc: An estimated 6,000 protesters in Sydney rallied against a controversial visit by Isaac Herzog.

title: Catherine O'Hara cause of death confirmed as pulmonary embolism
desc: The Schitt's Creek and Home Alone actress died last month in a US hospital, at the age of 71.

title: Catherine O'Hara cause of death confirmed as pulmonary embolism
desc: The actress died on 30 January in a Santa Monica hospital, at the age of 71.

title: Middlesbrough usurp Frank Lampard's Coventry, go top of Championship
desc: Middlesbrough took over at the top of the Championship as an impressive first-half performance earned them a 2-1 victory at Sheffield United.

title: What to look for in the delayed jobs, inflation data out this week
desc: Inflation and job creation are expected to hold steady, but revisions to the 2025 jobs numbers are expected to be large enough to show a net loss for all of last year.

title: Medical misinformation more likely to fool AI if source appears legitimate, study shows
desc: Feb 9 : Artificial intelligence tools are more likely to provide incorrect medical advice when the misinformation comes from what the software considers to be an authoritative source, a new study found.In tests of 20 open-source and proprietary large language models, the software was more often tricked by mis

title: Man accused of attacking 2 women at random in North York
desc: Toronto police are on the hunt for an unknown male suspect who is accused of randomly attacking two women in North York on Friday.

title: The rise and fall of local government elections
desc: Local council elections have been suspended since 1965, although talk about its revival has proven to be unsettling for some.
